PHP SDK

下载

$ wget http://tonggao.baidu.com/plugins/tonggao_sdk_php.phar

安装

$ mv tonggao_sdk_php.phar /path/to/wherever/you/like/

使用 - 推送事件

require 'phar://tonggao_sdk_php.phar/sdk.php';            // 导入SDK
$service_id  = '';                                        // 在百度通告 》个人中心 》 服务管理 子菜单下创建服务所获得的id
$service_key = '';                                        // API访问服务时需要的key，在服务详情页面生成
incident_client = new TonggaoIncident($service_id,$service_key);
//trigger incident
$incident_client->triggerIncident("This is the event description.");

使用 - 推送消息

require 'phar://tonggao_sdk_php.phar/sdk.php';            // 导入SDK
$appId = '';                                              // 应用id，由系统管理员分配，需放入http头部
$token = '';                                              // 应用访问所需的token，由系统管理员分配
$qudao_client = new TonggaoNotice($appId, $token);
$qudao_client->sendMessage('email', "tonggao@baidu.com", "here is email body", "here is email title");
$qudao_client->sendMessage('SMS', "139****1234", "here is sms message");
$qudao_client->sendMessage('phone', "139****1234");

Python SDK

下载

$ wget http://tonggao.baidu.com/plugins/tonggao_sdk_python.tar.gz

安装

$ tar -zxvf tonggao_sdk_python.tar.gz  /path/to/wherever/you/like

使用 - 推送事件

#!/usr/bin/env python
#encoding=utf-8
import tonggao_sdk_py
if "__main__" == __name__:
   serviceId = ""                                         # 在百度通告 》个人中心 》 服务管理 子菜单下创建服务所获得的id
   serviceKey =""                                         # API访问服务时需要的key，在服务详情页面生成
   tonggaoIncident = tonggao_sdk_py.TonggaoIncident(serviceId,serviceKey)
   #trigger incident
   tonggaoIncident.triggerIncident("This is the event description.")

使用 - 推送消息

#!/usr/bin/env python
#encoding=utf-8
import tonggao_sdk_py
if "__main__" == __name__:
   #set your appId and token
   appId  = ""                                              # 应用id，由系统管理员分配，需放入http头部
   token = ""                                               # 应用访问所需的token，由系统管理员分配，需放入http头部
   tonggaoNotice = tonggao_sdk_py.TonggaoNotice(appId, token)
   # sendMessage
   tonggaoNotice.sendMessage("email", "liurongcheng@baidu.com", "here is email body", "here is email title")
   tonggaoNotice.sendMessage("sms", "139****1234", "here is sms message")
   tonggaoNotice.sendMessage("phone", "139****1234")

Java SDK

下载

$ wget http://tonggao.baidu.com/plugins/tonggao_sdk_java-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar

安装

在Eclipse右键工程 -> Properties -> Java Build Path -> Add JARs 。 选择tonggao_sdk_java-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar件。你就可以在工程中使用tonggao JAVA SDK了。

使用 - 推送事件

// import the need class
import com.baidu.szop.bellringer.sdk.TonggaoIncident;
public class Test {
    public  static void  main(String[] args) throws  Exception{
      // set your serviceId  and serviceKey
       int serviceId = 0;                                   // 在百度通告 》个人中心 》 服务管理 子菜单下创建服务所获得的id
       String serviceKey ="";                               // 应用访问所需的token，由系统管理员分配
       TonggaoIncident tonggaoIncident = new TonggaoIncident(serviceId,serviceKey);
       //trigger incident
       tonggaoIncident.triggerIncident("This is the event description.");
   }
}

使用 - 推送消息

// import the need class
import com.baidu.szop.bellringer.sdk.TonggaoNotice;
import com.baidu.szop.bellringer.sdk.util.SendType;
import com.baidu.szop.bellringer.sdk.TonggaoNotice;
import com.baidu.szop.bellringer.sdk.util.SendType;
public class Test {
    public  static void  main(String[] args) throws  Exception{
        // set your appId and token
        String appId  = "";
        String token = "";
        // sendweb端
        TonggaoNotice tonggaoNotice = new TonggaoNotice(appId, token);
        //接受人可以是list
        // sendMessage
        tonggaoNotice.sendMessage(SendType.EMAIl,"tonggao@baidu.com","here is email body", "here is email title");
        tonggaoNotice.sendMessage(SendType.SMS,"139****1234","Message",null);
        tonggaoNotice.sendMessage(SendType.PHONE,"139****1234",null,null);
    }
}
